attributes.action: Give the English the same privilege as the Scots, Welsh etc. of having their own National Anthem.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop dicriminating against the English people by preventing them from having an English National Anthem of their choice. It is pure racial discrimination by preventing the English people from having one, because the Scots and Welsh have theirs. Offer the English people a choice in a referendum between Jerusalem,Land of Hope and Glory or I Vow to Thee my Country. We English want to restore some pride in our nation, it is right and of the utmost importance that we do this now please.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
